name: Village Help
description:
This is a simple game where you collect coins that bandits stole from your village. 

Collect coins, don't die and enjoy.

Terrain project made for game design course for Academy of arts in Novi sad.

CREDITS : 

-SKYTHIAN CAT - Hand painted textures.

- Alexander from www.orangefreesounds.com - Coin collected sound.

- www.bensounds.com - Game music.

- www.zapsplat.com - Hit effect.

- http://soundimage.org/ - Main menu music.
